admst:error.format: %s: second argument is not a probe\n
%s: first argument is not a variable\n

admst:when.test: [name='pow' or name='hypot' or name='min' or name='max']

admst:error.format: case statement: please implement me! (local declaration)\n
case statement: please implement me! (inside block)\n

admst:when.test: [name='vbic' or name='hic0_full' or name='hic2_full' or name='bjt504_va']

admst:error.format: %s: device not handled by the adms ngspice interface\n

admst:for-each.select: variable[input='no' and scope='global_model' and setinmodel='yes' and insource='yes']
variable[input='no' and scope='global_instance' and setininstance='yes' and insource='yes']

admst:if.test: [name!='initial_model' and name!='initial_instance' and name!='initializeModel' and name!='initializeInstance' and name!='initial_step']
[name!='initial_model' and name!='initial_instance' and name!='initializeModel' and name!='initializeInstance' and name!='initial_step']

admst.admst:template:
/*wrapper*/ #define pModel model #define pInst here #define mint_get_circuit_tempK() _circuit_temp #define voltages(n) NP(n) #define _DDT(q) q #define _DDX #define _DERIVATEFORDDX
#define _DERIVATE2

admst:fatal.format: probe not allowed inside analog functions\n

admst:when.test: [ name='cos' or name='sin' or name='tan' or name='cosh' or name='sinh' or name='tanh' or name='acos' or name='asin' or name='atan' or name='ln' or name='log' or name='exp' or name='sqrt' or name='abs' or name='limexp' or name='div' or name='pow' or name='hypot' or name='min' or name='max' ]

admst:fatal.format: contribution not allowed inside analog functions\n
contribution not allowed inside analog functions\n

admst:assert.format: %(name): second argument is not a probe\n

admst:variable.name: e
admst:variable.select: 0.0 /*ddx should be top node of expression!*/
